welcomeBack.speech: Hello, Welcome to Smarter Kid quiz <break time="500ms" />. You best result was level: {{bestLevel}}. <break time="500ms" />Do you think you getting smarter?
welcomeBack.text:
Hi Welcome back to Smarter Kid quiz!. Your best result was level: {{bestLevel}}.
Do you think you getting smarter?
